metadata.title: CVE-2024-42460 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Elliptic package 6.5.6 for Node.js, ECDSA signature malleabilityoccurs because there is a missing check for whether the leading bit of rand s is zero.

criterions.comment: node-elliptic package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
